1.1.name: wordpress/activetrail-free-email-signup-form
1.1.description:
Add a signup form quickly and easily to your website. Send stunning newsletters to your subscribers using ActiveTrail, the world's leading email marketing solution.

http://blip.tv/activet/activetrail-3648203

Do it in three easy steps:

  1. Add the plugin to your website.
  2. Collect subscribers.
  3. Email them stunning newsletters using ActiveTrail.

Don't have an ActiveTrail account? Sign Up - Free

With ActiveTrail you can:

  • Manage your contacts, divide them into groups, segment them by demographics, and personalize your message for a results-driven, targeted email-marketing campaign with a personal touch.
  • Create great looking campaigns,
